text: Dimaadua ga hagagida mai gi di au nia gada golee laagau ‘fig’ e lua ala i mua di Hale Daumaha. (Di mee deenei ne hai i muli Nebuchadnezzar di king o Babylonia ne lahi galabudi di King Jehoiachin, dela go tama daane Jehoiakim di king o Judah, gaa lahi gi daha mo Jerusalem, gaa lahi gi Babylonia, mo ana gau dagi o Judah, ana gau ngalua guu odi anga, mo ana gau gu wouwou di ngalua.)24.1 2 Kings 24.12-16; 2 Kronikel 36.10
